items.sentence: I think you know Tom isn\'t going to do that unless you help him.
Since the note was written in French, it was easy for me to read.
The problem is all parents wants their children to go to Harvard.
Tom can still play the piano even though he doesn\'t own one now.
Tom can\'t have that, but he can have anything else on the table.
Tom certainly didn\'t expect to inherit the house from his uncle.
Tom certainly didn\'t let anyone know that he was arriving today.
Tom eats lunch at the school cafeteria two or three times a week.
Tom is a little older than the rest of the students in his class.
Tom made a lot of money in Boston and then moved back to Chicago.
